scripts.build:windows: npm run build && cargo tauri build --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc
scripts.build:macos: npm run build && cargo tauri build --target universal-apple-darwin
scripts.build:linux: npm run build && cargo tauri build --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
scripts.build:android: npm run build && cargo tauri android build
scripts.build:ios: npm run build && cargo tauri ios build
